title: Husband Admits To Cheating In Monday Morning Confessions + Someone On The Show Nearly Gets Into A Fight At Concert
itunes:title: Husband Admits To Cheating In Monday Morning Confessions + Someone On The Show Nearly Gets Into A Fight At Concert
description:
A husband admitted to kissing his wife’s relative in today’s Monday Morning Confessions. Eddie is planning a ‘Mommy Night’ for his wife. Also, someone on the show talks about a time they nearly got into a fight at a concert.
